Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Perils_Covered: Natural Calamities (Flood, Earthquake, Landslides, Snow falls), Fire & Allied Perils, Explosion, Machinery Breakdown, Business Interruption, Terrorist threats/attacks, Sabotage, Bomb threat and explosion, Disruption in power supply, Cyber Attack, Leakage in power house and other underground structures.
Main_Activities: Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement)
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Key terms and conditions are outlined in the Letter of Acceptance, including requirements for acknowledgement, confirmation via signed duplicate, and immediate commencement of works at Teesta-V Power Station, Sikkim. The tender is for Package-6, Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works.
